welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.part1: Task Manager is an application that helps an individual or a group of developers to achieve their goals.
welcome.part2: Our app helps you break down large tasks into smaller ones, thereby enabling you to successfully achieve your goals.
welcome.part3: Team coordination. Allocate tasks within the team to each other thanks to the boards.
welcome.part4: Keep track of what stage your project is at.

login.name: Name
login.registermessage: If you are already registered - click

name.message: The name can contain only Russian or English letters, without numbers
name.min: The minimum length of the name is 2 letters
name.max: The maximum length of the name is 15 letters

login.message: Login contains only English letters and numbers
login.min: The minimum length of the name is 3 letters
login.max: The maximum length of the name is 15 letters

password.min: The password must be more than 8 characters
password.max: The maximum password length is 15 characters
